title: Andie MacDowell bonds with daughter Margaret Qualley over yoga and hikes after Pete Davidson split
text:
He's dated his way through five beautiful actresses since 2015.

And Margaret Qualley is the latest beauty Pete Davidson has split from following a whirlwind romance.

Fortunately the 24-year-old's mom, Andie MacDowell, is helping her daughter get over the heartbreak.

She's there for her: Andie MacDowell, 61, glammed up in green satin at Saturday's LA Dance Project Gala where she revealed she was helping daughter Margaret Qualley get over Pete Davidson split

And yoga seems to be one of the ways they are bonding.

'We do a lot of yoga! And we hike, we have great, deep conversations,' Andie, 61, dished to Us at the LA Dance Project Gala in Los Angeles on Saturday.

But she wouldn't comment on Margaret's split with the 25-year-old Saturday Night Live star saying, 'It would be thoughtless on my part.'

Margaret, who is the daughter of Gap model Paul Qualley, and Pete started dating in August.

Plenty of PDAs: Margaret, 24, and Pete, 25, were spotted out hand-in-hand at the Venice Film Festival where her movie Seberg premiered in August

They were seen together that month hand-in-hand at the Venice Film Festival in Italy where Margaret's movie Seberg premiered.

But it didn't last. Pete had moved on by early October although they reportedly remain friends.

Margaret follows a string of beauties including Ariana Grande, Kate Beckinsale, Carly Aquilino and Cazzie David.

Single again: Pete flashed the peace sign backstage at SNL on October 12. He and Margaret are reportedly still friends

That makes Pete a serial monogamist - a term Andie would be familiar with as it was famously used to describe her co-star Hugh Grant's character Charles in 1994's Four Weddings And A Funeral.

Meanwhile, the Once Upon A Time In Hollywood star has her busy career to help heal her heart.

Aside from Seberg, Margaret has drama The Chain in pre-production and My Salinger Year with Sigourney Weaver, in post-production. Neither have set dates.
description: On Saturday, the 61-year-old actress revealed she and the Seberg star are doing 'a lot of yoga and we hike' to help the 24-year-old get over her three-month fling with SNL's Pete Davidson, 25.
